title: Intrusion
description: When a husband and wife move to a small town, a home invasion leaves the wife traumatized and suspicious that those around her might not be who they seem.

reviews.text: bad[ bad ]adjective, worse, worst;(Slang) bad·der, bad·dest for 36.not good in any manner or degree.
C’mon! Another movie with a “hidden basement”?! Are filmmakers really trying to copy the much better movie, Parasite!!?

You can sense the twist so easily that it's insulting.Just pay attention to the characteristics of the characters and it's enough.The tension? The suspense?I looked for them all the time, and I never found them.Better watch Midnight Mass.
Great thriller, multiple scares, loved it! Suspenseful and well done, really enjoyed it
الفيلم جيد حتى النهاية تشعر بخيبة ولكن يستحق المشاهدة بدون شك

This film is very banal for its plot and tries in vain not to be by offering you plot twists that are very predictable, you understand from the beginning who is the real villain and even if the film tries to mislead you it fails. Apart from that, however, the film manages to maintain a good atmosphere of tension.
